guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong against grouped enemies;


### 2. CONS

- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Medium cost champions (median cost: 3 coins);
- Strongly Gnar's dependent.


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=dragon]]
[[trait=wild]]

[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=lucian]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=graves]] → [[champion=poppy]]
 
[[champion=lucian]] → [[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=gnar]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]
[[champion=karthus]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=aurelion-sol]] [[champion=karthus]] → [[champion=ahri]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]→[[trait=yordle]]

[[item=yuumi]] → [[champion=kennen]] [[champion=poppy]] [[champion=gnar]]

[[item=jeweled-gauntlet]]→ [[champion=veigar]][[champion=aurelion-sol]][[champion=karthus]]

[[item=mittens]]→ [[champion=aurelion-sol]][[champion=karthus]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS

- Forte dano em área;
- Forte controle de multidão;
- Forte contra inimigos agrupados;


### 2. CONTRAS

- Necessita de troca de campeões ao longo da partida;
- Campeões de custo médio (custo mediano: 3 moedas);
- Fortemente dependente de Gnar;


### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=dragon]]
[[trait=wild]]


[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo:

[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=lucian]]

#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=graves]] → [[champion=poppy]]
 
[[champion=lucian]] → [[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=gnar]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]
[[champion=karthus]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=aurelion-sol]] [[champion=karthus]] → [[champion=ahri]]


### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]→[[trait=yordle]]

[[item=yuumi]] → [[champion=kennen]] [[champion=poppy]] [[champion=gnar]]

[[item=jeweled-gauntlet]]→ [[champion=veigar]][[champion=aurelion-sol]][[champion=karthus]]

[[item=mittens]]→ [[champion=aurelion-sol]][[champion=karthus]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong single damage;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against grouped enemies;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Dependent of two tier 5 champions;
- Dependent of Kindred (bonus [[trait=phantom]][[trait=ranger]]


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=yordle]]
[[item=hush]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]
[[item=quicksilver]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=braum]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=fiora]]→ [[champion=sejuani]]


#### Late Game:


[[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=anivia]]

[[champion=garen]]→[[champion=kaisa]]

[[champion=anivia]]→ [[champion=braum]][[champion=volibear]]

[[champion=kaisa]]→ [[champion=kayle]]

[[item=force-of-nature]]

### 1. PROS

- Strong burst damage;
- Strong against spred out enemies;
- Strong area damage;


### 2. CONS

- Medium cost champions (median cost: 3 coins);
- Weak survivability;
- Weak against enemies equiped with [[item=phantom-dancer]]

### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong against grouped enemies;
- Strong control of enemies' mana;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Strongly mana’s dependent;


### 3. WEAKNESS

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong survivability;
- Low cost champions (median cost: 2.5 coins)
- Minor need in changing champions’s positions;
- Disables enemy items at the beginning of the turn;


### 2. CONS


- Heavily dependent of Kayle to get the full Noble bonus;
- Heavily dependent on items;
- Needs [[item=spatula]] to make [[item=runaans-hurricane]] for Jinx;
- Difficult to achieve full efficiency (lack of alternative champions to complete the Nobles’ bonus)

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=hextech]] [[trait=demon]][[trait=void]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]
[[item=giant-slayer]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=tristana]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=varus]]

[[champion=lucian]]

[[champion=vi]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=leona]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=kayle]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=vi]]→ [[champion=jayce]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=red-buff]] [[item=cursed-blade]] [[item=sword-breaker]] → [[champion=jinx]] [[champion=lucian]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS

- Forte sobrevivência;
- Campeões de baixo custo (custo mediano: 2,5 moedas);
- Baixa necessidade de mudança de posicionamento dos campeões;
- Inutiliza os itens dos inimigos no início do turno;


### 2. CONTRAS


- Fortemente dependente de Kayle;
- Fortemente dependente de itens.
- Necessita de [[item=spatula]] para [[item=runaans-hurricane]] de Jinx;
- Composição difícil de se obter eficiência completa (falta de campeões alternativos para completar o bônus de Nobres);

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=hextech]] [[trait=demon]][[trait=void]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]
[[item=giant-slayer]]

### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo:

[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=tristana]]

#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=lucian]]
[[champion=vi]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=leona]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=kayle]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=vi]]→ [[champion=jayce]]

### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=red-buff]] [[item=cursed-blade]] [[item=sword-breaker]] → [[champion=jinx]] [[champion=lucian]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong survivability;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against magic damage compositions;
- Strong against high defense and magic defense compositions;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Dependent of two Tier 5 Champions;
Relatively low damage if you don't have Aurelian Sol with the right items and if you don't have the sorcerer’s bonus.


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=dragon]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]
[[item=giant-slayer]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=kassadin]]

[[champion=khazix]]

[[champion=reksai]]

[[champion=braum]]

[[champion=mordekaiser]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=khazix]]→ [[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=leona]]

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]→ [[champion=karthus]]

[[champion=pantheon]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=chogath]][[champion=reksai]]→[[champion=khazix]] 

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]] 

[[champion=karthus]]→[[champion=mordekaiser]] 

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=kaisa]]+[[item=yuumi]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=chogath]] [[champion=reksai]] [[champion=pantheon]][[champion=kaisa]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS

- Forte controle de grupo;
- Forte sobrevivência;
- Amaldiçoa um campeão inimigo no início do turno (bônus de Fantasma);
- Forte contra composições baseadas em dano mágico;
- Forte contra composições de alta defesa e defesa mágica;


### 2. CONTRAS

- Campeões de alto custo (custo mediano: 4 moedas);
- Fortemente dependente de mana;
- Dependente de dois campeões de nível 5;
- Dano relativamente baixo se não possuir Aurelian Sol com os itens certos e se não possuir o bônus de feiticeiros.


### 3. FRAQUEZA

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]→ [[champion=karthus]]

[[champion=pantheon]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong single damage;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Extra survivability thanks to Kindred’s ability;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Weak against spread out enemies;
- Strongly dependent of Kindred ([[trait=phantom]] [[trait=ranger]] bonus);
- Dependent of two tier 5 champions;

- Fortemente dependente de mana;
- Dependente de dois campeões de nível 5;
- Necessita do item [[item=darkin]] em algum campeão para obter bônus de demônios.


### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=dragon]]
[[trait=wild]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong survivability;
- Strong area damage;
- Minor need in changing champions’s positions;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Dependent of two tier 5 champions;
- Strongly dependent of Swain ([[trait=imperial]] bonus);
- Few ranged champions;
- Dependent of [[item=knights-vow]] to obtain last [[trait=knight]] bonus;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=void]]
[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=yordle]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Low cost champions (median cost: 2.5 coins)
- Strong burst damage;
- Strong single damage;
- Strong against high defense and magic defense compositions;


### 2. CONS

- Weak against grouped enemies;
- Squishy champions;
- Assassins are weak against enemies equiped with [[item=phantom-dancer]];


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=noble]]
[[trait=yordle]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=phantom-dancer]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=iceborn-gauntlet]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=nidalee]]
[[champion=ahri]]
[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=warwick]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=kassadin]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→[[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=rengar]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=kaisa]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=kaisa]][[champion=khazix]]→[[champion=kassadin]]+[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]

[[champion=ahri]]→[[champion=nidalee]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=zekes-herald]]

[[item=locket-of-the-iron-solari]]

[[item=guardian-angel]]

[[item=infinity-edge]][[item=hand-of-justice]]→[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]→[[champion=warick]][[champion=chogath]][[champion=reksai]][[champion=gnar]]
